Report.Query: SELECT OPER_DATE as searchdate, OPER_TIME_SECTION as timesection, OWNED_COUNT as owncount, ONLINE_COUNT as onlcount, OPER_COUNT as opercount, NON_OPER_COUNT as noopercount, AREA_CODE as areacode, ORG_GROUP as orgname, ORG_GROUP_ID as orgid, row_number() over (order by OPER_DATE) as RowTimeNumber FROM RPT_MONITOR_AMPMPEAK
